MemoryInfobox.previous: Ashes to Ashes (Ainigmata Ostraka)|Ashes to Ashes

General_Description: '''Bottomless Lake''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Taking the plunge? Everyone on the [[Kephallonia|island]] thinks this is the deepest dive, but there is a [[Lake Abythos|lake]] in the [[Coast of Koliadai]] that is rumored to be bottomless. If you are able to dive as far as the woman in [[marble]], you will be able to claim me.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
